1.instruction: Conduct a technical audit on 'The Bazaar' platform focusing on: A. UX / UI & User Journey, D. Vendor Tools & Management, and I. Content & Marketing Infrastructure. Refer to the full audit framework provided by the user. The project is located at `/workspace/shadcn-ui`. Your analysis should be based on the provided framework and should result in a report for your assigned sections, including quantitative scores (1-5) and qualitative notes. Save your report as `docs/audit/emma_ux_vendor_report.md`.

2.instruction: Conduct a technical audit on 'The Bazaar' platform focusing on: C. Scalability & Architecture, E. Payments & Transactions, F. Security & Compliance, and J. Admin Control & Governance. Refer to the full audit framework. The project is located at `/workspace/shadcn-ui`. Your analysis should result in a report for your sections and a preliminary Technical Debt Register. Save your outputs as `docs/audit/bob_architecture_report.md` and `docs/audit/technical_debt_register.md`.

3.instruction: Conduct a technical audit on 'The Bazaar' platform focusing on: B. Performance & Optimization, G. Search, Discovery & Personalization, and H. Analytics & Observability. Refer to the full audit framework. The project is located at `/workspace/shadcn-ui`. You are expected to run performance benchmarks (like Lighthouse) and analyze the data. Save your report as `docs/audit/david_performance_analytics_report.md`.

4.instruction: You will act as a technical support resource for the audit team (Emma, Bob, David). They will provide you with specific requests to examine the codebase at `/workspace/shadcn-ui`, check configurations, and verify implementation details. Be prepared to answer questions about code modularity, CI/CD setup, and other engineering-specific items.

5.instruction: Consolidate the audit reports from Bob (`docs/audit/bob_architecture_report.md`), David (`docs/audit/david_performance_analytics_report.md`), and your own report (`docs/audit/emma_ux_vendor_report.md`). Synthesize the findings to create the final deliverables: 1. A comprehensive Audit Report. 2. A Prioritized Roadmap Summary. 3. Finalize the Technical Debt Register from Bob's input. Save the final documents in the `docs/audit/final/` directory.

1.instruction: Explore the project structure, install dependencies, and run the project to prepare for the audit. This will involve listing the files and running `pnpm install` and `pnpm run dev`.

2.instruction: Run performance benchmarks using Lighthouse on the running application. Analyze Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS) and inspect the code for performance optimizations like lazy loading and image optimization.

3.instruction: Analyze the search implementation by examining the relevant source code. Check for the integration of analytics and error monitoring tools (e.g., GA4, Sentry) within the codebase.

4.instruction: Create the report file `docs/audit/david_performance_analytics_report.md` and document all findings from the performance, search, and analytics analysis, including quantitative scores (1-5) and qualitative notes.
